title: Ep 152: Divine Comedy with Atsuko Okatsuka
itunes:title: Ep 152: Divine Comedy with Atsuko Okatsuka
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets dressed like it’s 2019 and Doree’s hair grows to new lengths. Then, comedian Atsuko Okatsuka (Let’s Go, Atsuko!) joins them to talk to about why we trust Kiehls maybe more than we should, what it was like growing up undocumented in the US, an...
description:
Kate gets dressed like it’s 2019 and Doree’s hair grows to new lengths. Then, comedian Atsuko Okatsuka (Let’s Go, Atsuko!) joins them to talk to about why we trust Kiehls maybe more than we should, what it was like growing up undocumented in the US, and what comedy has been like through the pandemic. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

 

TRADITIONAL MEDICINALS - Use code EVER20 for 20% off at traditionalmedicinals.com.

 

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

 

THIRDLOVE - Get 20% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.

 

FLEUR & BEE - Head to fleurandbee.com and use code FOREVER35 to get 25% off.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
